item.title: Pilsner Brew Day - July 2019
item.description: Today is brew day, and I will be cooking the Brewer’s Pantry ‘Pilsners’ kit. This is my first attempt at an all-grain brewBrewing using grains as the main ingredient, rather than extract. , and the only additional equipment that I had to purchase was the mash tunLarge insulated container used for steeping grains in hot water (see mash). and some 1⁄2 inch tubing! The jump from extract brewingBrewing using malt extract syrup to all-grainBrewing using grains as the main ingredient, rather than extract.
